About 1905.
By Mulford Simonson.
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr.

(2) A view of the lake in early Spring.
April 3, 1924.

(3) A view of the broken Brooks Pond dam after the rain storm of September 6, 1926.
September 1926.

P. L. Sperr.
